items.summary: Add a backend function to authenticate admin users with username/password credentials. The hardcoded admin username is 'azadnexus.global@gmail.com' and password is 'Karusu_7'. The function should return a session token or boolean success indicator upon valid credentials, and reject invalid ones.

Replace the Internet Identity-based admin authentication on the /admin page with a username/password login form. The login form should have fields for email and password, a submit button, and display an error message on invalid credentials. On successful login, show the buyer inquiries dashboard. Add a logout button to return to the login screen.
